General.Name: Farmacias Benavides S.A.B. de C.V.
General.Description: Farmacias Benavides, S.A.B. de C.V. engages in the retail of health and wellness products. The company also provides personal care and beauty, drink, and food and home products, as well as dermo cosmetic products. It operates a network of pharmacies, medical offices, and distribution centers. The company offers its products under the Almus, Benavides Pharmacies, No.7, Boots, Soap & Glory, and Well Beginnings brands. The company was founded in 1917 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico. Farmacias Benavides, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc.
General.Address: Avenida Fundadores No. 935 interior 301, Monterrey, NL, Mexico, 64750
